name: Sleep Time!
description:
Welcome to Sleep Time! It's time to head to bed and your room is cluttered. You just can't seem to fall asleep thinking about the mess you have all over your room. Find all possible distractions around the room to clear your mind and help you get some rest. Controls: Point and click Instructions: Click the start button to begin your search. Use your mouse to click all objects listed on the right of your screen to remove them from the room. Once the game is over you can click the start button to try again.

(-Angela Z, Rosa G, Lorie L)
